title: Add PRD Skill Reference to CLAUDE.md Files
description: Update CLAUDE.md files to tell Claude to use /prd skill when working with PRDs, stories, or Ralph. The skill itself has the authoritative documentation - CLAUDE.md just needs to point there.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Add to global ~/.claude/CLAUDE.md: 'When adding PRD stories or working with Ralph, use /prd skill'
Add to ralphtools/CLAUDE.md: 'For PRD story format and management, invoke /prd skill'
Verify /prd skill contains story format documentation (criteria objects, file locations, etc.)
If /prd skill missing format docs, add them to the skill
